founders.name: Devan Plantamura, Founder
founders.description: I am a serial entrepreneur in the defense technology sector with a passion for safety, ethics, and compliance no matter the product. I have experience in operational excellence, business development, compliance, and deep understanding of AI, NLP, and Hardware. Ares Industries is focused on building the next generation of smart munitions.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Ares Industries**

Founded in 2024 and situated in El Segundo, CA, Ares Industries is a bold player in the aerospace and industrial sectors with a rather unconventional mission: to build low-cost cruise missiles. This ambitious startup is part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, which suggests that they've caught the eye of some savvy investors and mentors.

**Team and Leadership**
Ares has a compact team of two employees, which highlights its startup nature — small, agile, and focused. Jerry Friedman serves as their Group Partner, lending his expertise and guidance to steer this venture in the right direction.

**Current Focus**
At this stage, Ares Industries is focused on establishing itself in the market and refining its offerings. Although specifics on their projects are still emerging, the foundational goal of creating accessible missile technology shapes every strategic move they make.

**Getting in Touch**
If you’re interested in learning more about what Ares Industries is up to, or if you’re considering investment opportunities or career prospects, you can reach out through their [website](https://aresindustries.com). They have sections dedicated to investors and potential employees, fostering a community around their mission.

In a world of aerospace giants, Ares Industries is positioning itself with a unique and potentially disruptive proposition. Keep an eye on them — their journey is likely to unfold in unexpected ways.
